In supersession of this office Circular of even number dated 24/01/2007 on the
subject cited above, Ms. Mayawati, former Chief Minister is hereby allowed the facility
of proceeding directly through VIP Lounge to the tarmac in a bullet proof vehicle to
catch flights and similar arrangements for her arrivals at all Civil Airports in the
country, till further review.

This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).
